channel.title: CVE Feed for semantic-release -- semantic-release
channel.description: The latest CVEs for semantic-release -- semantic-release

item.title: CVE-2020-26226|2024-08-04T15:56:03.009Z -- semantic-release -- semantic-release
item.description: In the npm package semantic-release before version 17.2.3, secrets that would normally be masked by `semantic-release` can be accidentally disclosed if they contain characters that become encoded when included in a URL. Secrets that do not contain characters that become encoded when included in a URL are already masked properly. The issue is fixed in version 17.2.3.
